title: D.L. Hughley
description:
This week Kevin is joined by comedian and actor D.L. Hughley. They discuss how standup comedy has changed, how to stay authentic to the craft, the impact of The Kings of Comedy tour, and the comedians they admire.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (D.L. Hughley, Kevin Hart)
